text: Ritter Sport German chocolate tradition This traditional, family owned German chocolate manufacturer was established in 1912 in Bad Cannstatt, Germany by husband & wife Ritter with the idea to "make a chocolate that fits in every sports jacket pocket without breaking and has the same weight as a normal long bar" - giving the famous chocolate brand its name - Ritter Sport.
